dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I'll try to blend in with the villagers and avoid raising any suspicion. Let's focus on the common goal of surviving in this game.

dialogue.message: I stand by my investigation, Alice. Let's remain vigilant and focus on identifying and voting for the assassin, who I believe is Charlie. We must ensure the safety of the villagers.
